page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT IN FLECKNEY
page.content: Fleckney has a variety of employment in the village but many people commute each day as far afield as Northampton and Nottingham. The shops can provide for almost all the day to day needs of the village and they are staffed by66% of the villagers the rest coming in from the other villages.The bulk of the factories are sited on a small industrial estate on the edge of the village. A surprisingly low percentage of the workforce here are villagers only 40%.The opening of 2 convenience food shops(a fish and chip shop and a takeaway Chinese)provide no extra work for the villagers.However the large new Spar Supermarket has provided the village with 11 jobs.
